question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "Biologically inspired perceptual alignment The centertooutward generation pattern aligns with human visual processing mechanisms, including central fixation bias and centersurround attention profiles , promoting cognitive plausibility in the generated images"?
reference_entry: C. N. Boehler, J. K. Tsotsos, M. A. Schoenfeld, H.-J. Heinze,
